description: This file implements a React hook and utility functions for managing toast notifications, including adding, updating, dismissing, and removing toasts with a limit and delay features.

methods.name: genId
methods.description: Generates a unique string ID for toasts.

methods.name: addToRemoveQueue
methods.description: Schedules removal of a toast after a delay.

methods.name: reducer
methods.description: Handles state transitions for toast actions.

methods.name: dispatch
methods.description: Dispatches actions to update toast state.

methods.name: toast
methods.description: Creates a new toast with update and dismiss methods.

methods.name: useToast
methods.description: Custom React hook to access toast state and actions.
